org.springframework.kafka.support.converter

Interface MessageConverter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BatchMessageConverter, RecordMessageConverter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchMessagingMessageConverter, BytesJsonMessageConverter, MessagingMessageConverter, ProjectingMessageConverter, StringJsonMessageConverter

    public interface MessageConverter
    A top level interface for message converters.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Gary Russell
